mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Carlile, John S. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Carlile, John S.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Sept 17 1861. By Telegraph from Clarksburg 17 1861. Not poll books enough for this county send twenty nine (29) more you sent by me but seventy five they want one hundred & four (104). Jno S. Carlile 24w77Col
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Carlile, John S.
Clarksburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
